query:
UPDATE entities
                    SET attributes = jsonb_set(
                        jsonb_set(
                            attributes,
                            '{last_triggered_at}',
                            to_jsonb(NOW())
                        ),
                        '{total_triggers}',
                        to_jsonb((COALESCE((attributes->>'total_triggers')::INTEGER, 0) + 1)::INTEGER)
                    ),
                    updated_at = NOW()
                    WHERE id = $1
